Web Data Connector

Bring the data that you care about into Tableau.

This site will get you up and running with the Web Data Connector (WDC). The WDC SDK, including the simulator, developer samples, and documentation are all open source.


Get Started   Download v2.0
Note: This site is for version 2.0 of the WDC, which is still in beta, and will only be compatible with Tableau 10.0. For version 1.0 of the WDC, click here.

Documentation

Read the documentation for the Web Data Connector platform, view tutorials and samples, and learn more about underlying concepts.

API Reference

View of all of the available APIs within the Web Data Connector SDK.

Community

Browse connectors built by the community that you can use to connect to data from Tableau!

What's New?

Keep up to date with the latest news, including upcoming feature announcements, known issues, and release notes.

This site is open source. Suggestions and pull requests are welcome on our GitHub page.
